title: The Apprentice 2015: Hair's looking at you! Six of the funniest pics and vids
text:
The Apprentice 2015: Hair's looking at you! Six of the funniest pics and vids The Apprentice 2015: Hair's looking at you! Six of the funniest pics and vids Share 
Lord Sugar wanted a new brand of shampoo and an accompanying marketing campaign. 
However, it could be argued that Twitter got more creative than the teams from The Apprentice. 
Here are six of the funniest tweets sparked by the second cringe-inducing episode. 1. A prickly customer 
— Chuck Thomas (@chuckthomasuk) October 15, 2015 2. May the foam be with you 
— Jonny Geller (@JonnyGeller) October 15, 2015 3. Touchy! 
— Toby Earle (@TobyonTV) October 15, 2015 4. Carry on crimping 
— Scott Bryan (@scottygb) October 15, 2015 5. There are no words Shampoo for the over fifties you say? #TheApprentice pic.twitter.com/gsXSQKcpyJ 
— Katie Weasel (@KatieWeasel) October 15, 2015 6. The question of the hour… Who's she?? Never even seen her before. Has she been off sick? #TheApprentice pic.twitter.com/88zxQ0l44B 
— Joanna Montgomery (@joannamont) October 15, 2015 Share article 
The Apprentice continues on BBC One next week. Promoted Stories
